bioAsHtml: After his studies at the University of Antwerp (Computer Science & eBusiness) Jef started to work in the telecoms industry (mobile switching and network management). Five years ago, he joined Smals where he is active in social welfare and health care projects. Over the last year, he is driving the transition from a traditional architecture to a PaaS solution and he participates in the setup of a Belgian government cloud.

acceptedTalks.title: Open to a Shift. Belgian e-governmentâ€™s journey to PaaS

bio: After his studies at the University of Antwerp (Computer Science & eBusiness) Jef started to work in the telecoms industry (mobile switching and network management). Five years ago, he joined Smals where he is active in social welfare and health care projects. Over the last year, he is driving the transition from a traditional architecture to a PaaS solution and he participates in the setup of a Belgian government cloud.
